name: A Fruitfall Harvest
description:
Work together with a friend to catch fruit in your net while avoiding branches! If you get stuck, one of you can drop your net to escape, but be sure to pick it back up!


"A Fruitfall Harvest" was created in 2016 by MICA students Miki Straus, Yurie Murayama, Jess Connell & Corey Heffernan as a midterm assignment for Jason Corace's 2D Game Design class.
